result.html: Teastaíonn milseáin ó na leanaíThe children want sweets.
result.ponchtml: Teastaíonn milseáin ó na leanaíThe children want sweets.

result.eng: Children under ten years of age.
result.ga: Leanaí faoi bhun deich mbliana d'aois

result.html: Cuimhnígí ar na leanaí ocrachaThink of the hungry children.

result.eng: It was the children who saved us!
